posts.content:
Hi All

Is there a tech sheet somewhere with a clear description of what bolt sizes go where. Having to measure a few and clearly I’m incompetent as buying slightly the wrong size or threads not quiet right. Any pointers would be really (really), appreciated as it’s a step forward and a step back at the moment

http://oacdp.org/progref6268.html

I always start here to find bolt size, length and pitch but with DIN spec!

Has diagrams and numbered guide.
Lots of fun. Then I search VW suppliers and check what they say and then visit fixing suppliers to remove VW tax!
